directory.name: components
directory.purpose: This directory, `src\components`, houses the individual source code components for a Todo application, including input, item display, filtering, list management, and statistics.

subdirectories.name: TodoApp
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `TodoApp` directory contains the source code components for a Todo application within a temporary repository.

subdirectories.name: TodoFilters
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `TodoFilters` directory contains the source code for the components responsible for filtering tasks within a "Todo" application.

subdirectories.name: TodoInput
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `TodoInput` directory contains the source code for the components responsible for user input within a todo application.

subdirectories.name: TodoItem
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `TodoItem` directory contains the source code for the components related to individual todo items within a larger application.

subdirectories.name: TodoList
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `TodoList` directory contains the source code for the components related to the Todo List feature within a larger software project.

subdirectories.name: TodoStats
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `TodoStats` directory contains the source code for the components responsible for displaying statistics related to the todo application.
